title: Hungary
summary: Citi has been providing world-class products and services to local and multinational clients, financial and public sector institutions in Hungary since 1985. Our Citi Solutions Center Budapest is one of the largest in EMEA, providing services to 95 countries in over 25 functions in the region and around the globe.
